def discount(j_str):
    
    jewels=[]
    for x in j_str:
        if x.isalpha()==True:
            jewels.append(x)
    dis_jewels=set(jewels)
    jewel_count=[]
    for j in dis_jewels:
        count=0
        for x in jewels:
            if x==j:
                count+=1
        jewel_count.append(count)
    price=0
    for i in range(0,len(dis_jewels)):
        n=jewel_count[i]
        lucky=n/2
        extra=n%2
        price=price+lucky+extra
    print price
          
no_of_case=raw_input()
no_of_case=int(no_of_case)
while(no_of_case>0):
    no_of_case-=1
    jewels=raw_input()
    discount(jewels)
